message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of diffusing information in networks, which is a topic in distributed computing (cs.DC). The presence of malicious nodes makes it relevant to the sub-category of security and privacy (cs.SI). The assumption of limited knowledge of the network topology suggests the sub-category of networked systems (cs.NI). The analysis of consensus and broadcasting algorithms relates to the sub-category of control and optimization (cs.SY). Finally, the construction of robust graphs is a topic in cryptography and security (cs.CR).
